name: Bilboplanet
tagline: Open-source planet framework blog-agregator in PHP
body:
### Welcome to Bilboplanet.
In online media, Planet is a feed aggregator application designed to collect posts from the weblogs of members of an Internet community and display them on a single page. Planet runs on a web server. It creates pages with entries from the original feeds in chronological order, most recent entries first.

Websites that aggregate posts from different blogs using Planet or similar software are known as planets themselves. Such sites are commonly associated with free and open source software projects, where they are used to collect posts from the various developers involved in projects.

```
$ cd your_repo_root/repo_name
$ git fetch origin
$ git checkout bilboplanet
```

If you're using the GitHub for Mac, simply sync your repository and you'll see the new branch.

### Authors and Contributors
We are a small team working on the project and always looking for your contribution with bug-reports, quick fixes or event features-requests and well coded features. @theClimber and @Guiona are the two main developer of the project. Feel free to contact us if you encounter any problems regarding the Bilboplanet

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with the Bilboplanet? Check out the documentation on our website at http://bilboplanet.com or contact dev [at] bilboplanet.com and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
